content: कंकु(गु)ष्ठः --ष्ठं A kind of medicinal earth (described as of two colours, one of a silvery and one of a gold colour, or one of a light and one of a dark yellow).
कंकु(गु)ष्ठः --ष्ठं A kind of medicinal earth (described as of two colours, one of a silvery and one of a gold colour, or one of a light and one of a dark yellow).
